languages.text: {n}Паскаль благоговейно раздвигает алые складки мантии на груди. Вы видите истощенное бледное мясо, в которое безжалостно вгрызлись металлические шунты и гибкие провода. По прозрачным трубкам струится кровь, обогащенная необходимыми плоти веществами.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Паскаль благоговейно раздвигает алые складки мантии на груди. Вы видите истощенное бледное мясо, в которое безжалостно вгрызлись металлические шунты и гибкие провода. По прозрачным трубкам струится кровь, обогащенная необходимыми плоти веществами.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal reverently parts the robe's scarlet folds on his chest. You see emaciated white meat, gnawed through by metallic shunts and flexible wires. Blood runs through transparent pipes, enriched with the nutrients required by the pallid flesh.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Паскаль благоговейно раздвигает алые складки мантии на груди. Вы видите истощенное бледное мясо, в которое безжалостно вгрызлись металлические шунты и гибкие провода. По прозрачным трубкам струится кровь, обогащенная необходимыми плоти веществами.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pascal reverently pulls apart the scarlet folds of the robe on his chest. You see emaciated white meat, gnawed through by metallic shunts and flexible wires. Blood runs through transparent pipes, enriched by chemicals required by the pallid flesh.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Pascal reverently pulls apart the scarlet folds of the robe on his chest. You see emaciated white meat, gnawed through by metallic shunts and flexible wires. Blood runs through transparent pipes, enriched by chemicals required by the pallid flesh.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pascal reverently parts the robe's scarlet folds on his chest. You see emaciated white meat, gnawed through by metallic shunts and flexible wires. Blood runs through transparent pipes, enriched with the nutrients required by the pallid flesh.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal reverently parts the robe's scarlet folds on his chest. You see emaciated white meat, gnawed through by metallic shunts and flexible wires. Blood runs through transparent pipes, enriched with the nutrients required by the pallid flesh.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡虔诚地分开了他胸前满是褶皱的长袍。你看到他瘦削的白色肉体上插满了金属分流器与柔性电缆。血液流过无数透明的管道，为苍白的肉体提供它所需要的营养物质。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal reverently parts the robe's scarlet folds on his chest. You see emaciated white meat, gnawed through by metallic shunts and flexible wires. Blood runs through transparent pipes, enriched with the nutrients required by the pallid flesh.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡虔诚地分开了他胸前满是褶皱的长袍。你看到他瘦削的白色肉体上插满了金属分流器与柔性电缆。血液流过无数透明的管道，为苍白的肉体提供它所需要的营养物质。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal, reverente, separa los pliegues escarlatas de su túnica de su pecho. Ves una carne blanca escuchimizada, atravesada por tubos de metal y cables flexibles. Por los tubos transparentes circula sangre enriquecida con los nutrientes que la pálida carne necesita.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal reverently parts the robe's scarlet folds on his chest. You see emaciated white meat, gnawed through by metallic shunts and flexible wires. Blood runs through transparent pipes, enriched with the nutrients required by the pallid flesh.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal, reverente, separa los pliegues escarlatas de su túnica de su pecho. Ves una carne blanca escuchimizada, atravesada por tubos de metal y cables flexibles. Por los tubos transparentes circula sangre enriquecida con los nutrientes que la pálida carne necesita.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}パスカルの胸元で、ローブの緋色のひだが恭しく分けられる。やせ細った白い肉が、金属製のバイパスと柔軟なワイヤーにつながれているのが見える。血は透明なパイプを通り、青白い肉に必要な栄養素が満たされている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal reverently parts the robe's scarlet folds on his chest. You see emaciated white meat, gnawed through by metallic shunts and flexible wires. Blood runs through transparent pipes, enriched with the nutrients required by the pallid flesh.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルの胸元で、ローブの緋色のひだが恭しく分けられる。やせ細った白い肉が、金属製のバイパスと柔軟なワイヤーにつながれているのが見える。血は透明なパイプを通り、青白い肉に必要な栄養素が満たされている。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal öffnet ehrfürchtig die roten Falten der Robe über seiner Brust. Du siehst abgemagertes weißes Fleisch, zerfressen von metallischen Anschlüssen und biegsamen Drähten. Blut durchströmt durchsichtige Rohre, angereichert mit den Nährstoffen, die das fahle Fleisch benötigt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal reverently parts the robe's scarlet folds on his chest. You see emaciated white meat, gnawed through by metallic shunts and flexible wires. Blood runs through transparent pipes, enriched with the nutrients required by the pallid flesh.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal öffnet ehrfürchtig die roten Falten der Robe über seiner Brust. Du siehst abgemagertes weißes Fleisch, zerfressen von metallischen Anschlüssen und biegsamen Drähten. Blut durchströmt durchsichtige Rohre, angereichert mit den Nährstoffen, die das fahle Fleisch benötigt.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Avec grand respect, Pasqal écarte les deux pans de la robe écarlate qui recouvre sa poitrine. Vous apercevez sa peau blanche émaciée que transpercent des aiguilles métalliques et des câbles souples. Son sang s'écoule dans des tubes transparents, enrichi des nutriments requis par sa chair blafarde.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal reverently parts the robe's scarlet folds on his chest. You see emaciated white meat, gnawed through by metallic shunts and flexible wires. Blood runs through transparent pipes, enriched with the nutrients required by the pallid flesh.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Avec grand respect, Pasqal écarte les deux pans de la robe écarlate qui recouvre sa poitrine. Vous apercevez sa peau blanche émaciée que transpercent des aiguilles métalliques et des câbles souples. Son sang s'écoule dans des tubes transparents, enrichi des nutriments requis par sa chair blafarde.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal, büyük bir saygı ile cübbesinin göğsündeki kızıl katmanları ayırıyor. Zayıflamış, beyaz bir et tabakasının; paralel uzanan, metalik devrelerce ve esnek kablolarca dişlendiğini görüyorsun. Saydam boruların içinde, solgun bedeninin ihtiyaç duyduğu besin maddeleriyle zenginleştirilmiş kanı akıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal reverently parts the robe's scarlet folds on his chest. You see emaciated white meat, gnawed through by metallic shunts and flexible wires. Blood runs through transparent pipes, enriched with the nutrients required by the pallid flesh.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal büyük bir saygı ile cübbesinin göğsündeki kızıl katmanlarını ayırıyor. Zayıflamış, beyaz bir et tabakasının metalik paralel devrelerce ve esnek kablolarca dişlendiğini görüyorsun. Saydam boruların içinde, solgun bedeninin ihtiyaç duyduğu besin maddeleriyle zenginleştirilmiş kanı akıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
